title: [Health] New study based on the review of 12 studies with people with anxiety, depression and panic disorders, found that, regardless of age, there’s a link between mental illness and widely fluctuating blood pressure, which can lead to cardiovascular disease and organ damage

[Health] Red meat consumption and risk factors for type 2 diabetes: a systematic review and meta-analysis of randomized controlled trials - European Journal of Clinical Nutrition — The results of this meta-analysis suggest red meat intake does not impact most glycemic and insulinemic risk factors for T2D
